question: I wanted to know if one's feet lifts off the ground in sajdah,is the salaah broken??
answer:
QUESTION
Slmz honourable mufti saab. Just wanted to know if one's feet lifts off the ground in sajdah,is the salaah broken??
ANSWER


Share:

For the validity of Sajdah and the Salâh it is imperative for at least one foot to be on the ground during Sajdah. If one foot was on the floor for the duration of one tasbeeh, this will suffice. However, if none of the feet were on the floor during this duration, it would be necessary to repeat the Salâh. (Ahsanul Fatawa, Vol. 3, Pg. 398.)

And Allah Ta'ala knows best
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
